panels.description: Client + Server Retransmissions for sessions in $flow_g, grouped by server

targets.query: SELECT sum("from_srvr_retrans")+sum("to_srvr_retrans") FROM "persecond" WHERE ("m_type" = 'flow' AND "dp_type" = 'eps' AND "flow_g" =~ /^$flow_g$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "server"

SELECT sum("retransmissions_client") + sum("retransmissions_server") FROM "tcp_4_tuple" WHERE ("network_monitor_name" =~ /^$flow_g$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "server_ip" fill(null)

panels.title: Session Retransmissions for "$flow_g" (By Server)

targets.query: SELECT SUM("from_srvr_retrans") + SUM("to_srvr_retrans") AS "Total" FROM "persecond" WHERE ("flow_g" =~ /^$flow_g$/ AND "m_type" = 'flow' AND "dp_type" = 'eps') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "server", "client"

SELECT sum("retransmissions_client") + sum("retransmissions_server") FROM "tcp_4_tuple" WHERE ("network_monitor_name" =~ /^$flow_g$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "server_ip" fill(null)

panels.description: The number of (client and server) retransmissions for sessions with server $server, grouped by client.

targets.query: SELECT max("from_srvr_rtt") AS "from-server", max("to_srvr_rtt") AS "to-server" FROM "persecond" WHERE ("flow_g" =~ /^$flow_g$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($res) fill(0)

SELECT sum("retransmissions_client") + sum("retransmissions_server") FROM "tcp_4_tuple" WHERE ("network_monitor_name" =~ /^$flow_g$/ and server_ip =~ /$server/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "server_ip", "client_ip" fill(null)

panels.title: Session Retransmissions ($server Sessions)

targets.query: SELECT sum("retransmissions_client")  FROM "tcp_4_tuple" WHERE ("network_monitor_name" =~ /^$flow_g$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "server_ip" fill(null)

styles.linkTooltip: Click to drill down to current server

panels.description: The number of server retransmissions, grouped by client.

targets.query: SELECT max("from_srvr_rtt") AS "from-server", max("to_srvr_rtt") AS "to-server" FROM "persecond" WHERE ("flow_g" =~ /^$flow_g$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($res) fill(0)

SELECT sum("retransmissions_client") + sum("retransmissions_server") FROM "tcp_4_tuple" WHERE ("network_monitor_name" =~ /^$flow_g$/ and "server_ip" =~ /$server/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "server_ip", "client_ip" fill(none)

panels.title: Server Retransmissions (By Client)

targets.query: SELECT sum("retransmissions_client")  FROM "tcp_4_tuple" WHERE ("network_monitor_name" =~ /^$flow_g$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "client_ip" fill(null)

styles.linkTooltip: Click to drill down to current server
Link: Server TCP Errors Dashboard using Server ${__cell} of $flow_g

panels.description: The number of client retransmissions for sessions with server $server.

targets.query: SELECT max("from_srvr_rtt") AS "from-server", max("to_srvr_rtt") AS "to-server" FROM "persecond" WHERE ("flow_g" =~ /^$flow_g$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($res) fill(0)

SELECT sum("retransmissions_client") + sum("retransmissions_server") FROM "tcp_4_tuple" WHERE ("network_monitor_name" =~ /^$flow_g$/ and "server_ip" =~ /$server/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "server_ip", "client_ip" fill(null)

panels.title: Client Retransmissions ($server Sessions)

targets.query: SELECT sum("from_srvr_zwins")+sum("to_srvr_zwins") FROM "persecond" WHERE ("flow_g" =~ /^$flow_g$/ AND "m_type" = 'flow' AND "dp_type" = 'eps') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "server"
SELECT sum("zwins_client") + sum("zwins_client") FROM "tcp_4_tuple" WHERE ("network_monitor_name" =~ /^$flow_g$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "server_ip" fill(null)

panels.description: Client + Server Zero Window counts for sessions in $flow_g

styles.linkTooltip: Click to drill down to current server

targets.query: SELECT "zwins_client" + "zwins_server" FROM "tcp_4_tuple" WHERE ("network_monitor_name" =~ /^$flow_g$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "server_ip"

panels.title: Session Zero Windows for "$flow_g"

panels.description: The number of (client and server) zero windows for sessions with server $server, grouped by client.

targets.query: SELECT sum("from_srvr_zwins")+sum("to_srvr_zwins") FROM "persecond" WHERE ("flow_g" =~ /^$flow_g$/ AND "m_type" = 'flow' AND "dp_type" = 'eps' AND "server" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($res), "server", "client" fill(none)

SELECT sum("zwins_client") + sum("zwins_client") FROM "tcp_4_tuple" WHERE ("network_monitor_name" =~ /^$flow_g$/ AND server =~ /$server/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "server_ip", "client_ip" fill(null)

panels.title: Session ZWins for $server

list.label: Server
list.name: server
list.query: show tag values with key =~ /server|server_ip|client_ip/  limit 100

title: TCP Errors Network Monitor Level 2 w Sapphire
